email.title: Talk, Pizza and Drinks at Next Jump's New Office -- Next Jump Technology Open House
email.text: **Join Next Jump for a talk, with pizza and drinks, at their new office next Thursday. Only thirty spaces available!**
email.heading: Next Jump Technology Open House

event.location: 91 Waterloo Road, London, SE1 8RT, United Kingdom
event.text:
Come and visit our new office just outside of Waterloo Station!
Our Head of Engineering, James, will be giving a talk about the awesome tech we use to run our e-commerce site that annually brings in $3 billion dollars of sales.
Fun fact: Our platform serves over half a million users at peak during Black Friday week.
Afterwards, we'll have some time for you to meet and chat with the amazing NxJers over free pizza and drinks. Can't wait to see you there!
[**RSVP here -- tickets required!**](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/next-jump-technology-open-house-tickets-84780417511)
